attributes.action: SHUT DOWN e-petitions or give people a Yes No vote
attributes.additional_details:
E-Petition website should be shut down until a YES NO voting system is set up as people don't have the choice to vote down Bigoted e-petitions.

There are no contact details for the web site to report issues/faults etc.

The website is using "reCAPTCHA" which is making it hard/slow to sign petitions.

People cannot tell what petitions they have already signed as there is no history data, making the site impossible to use.
